The First AI in Ethiopia Conference was held in Addis Ababa University in 2019 - More details Coming soon

Keynote Speakers

Dr. Timnit Gebru
Google AI, Co-founder of Black in AI, Computer Vision & Fairness in AI
Dr. Rediet Abebe
Harvard Society of Fellows, Mechanism Design for Social Good (MD4SG)
Prof. Yolanda Gil
University of Southern California, President of AAAI

Addis Ababa University, Natural Language Technologies, Machine Learning

PhD Candidate, Polytechnic de Yaoundé, Deep Learning in context aware systems

Haramaya University, Natural language Processing

Wolaita Sodo University, Artificial Intelligence Natural Language Processing
